DrugName: Furosemide (for fluid management and blood pressure control)
Calcitriol or calcifediol (to manage secondary hyperparathyroidism associated with kidney disease)
Iron supplements (to treat anemia, likely due to chronic kidney disease)
Erythropoietin stimulating agents like Darbepoetin Alfa
Leflunomide or other DMARDs for lymphadenopathy and chronic inflammation management
Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (ACEIs) like Enalapril for blood pressure control and renal protection
